alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 25 at 8:26PM CDT until October 25 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Bosque and Hamilton counties * WHEN...Until 1130 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Low lying and/or poor drainage areas will experience minor flooding in the advisory area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hamilton, Meridian, Hico, Evant, Iredell, Cranfills Gap, Meridian State Park, Lake Whitney, Walnut Springs, Morgan, Norse, Eulogy, Fairy, Olin, Whiteway, Jonesboro, Aleman, Ireland, Carlton and Gentrys Mill.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
